root.name: Fuck Quest
root.description: Created by Richard Eter, Fuck Quest was built to be similar to point-and-click adventure games such as Space Quest and King's Quest. You play as Richard, with the ultimate goal being to have sexual intercourse with a girl. Fuck Quest has supposedly received rave reviews... at least, that's according to Richard Eter's personal website.

similar_games.game: Leisure Suit Larry 1: In the Land of the Lounge Lizards
